1. London
2. North West

title: Sara

title: Eben Adu
subtitle: It’s observed that almost one in every 35 people in the world is a migrant- this includes migrant workers, international students, and refugees. title: Andrew Rose

title: Dr Teresa Naidoo
subtitle:
#OTD in 1943 first 
transport of #Jewish prisoners from #Rome reached #Birkenau #ConcentrationCamp. The arrests of Italian Jews and Jewish refugees in #Italy began immediately after the surrender on 8.09.1943. 8.000 Jews lived in Rome that time. 1023 were deported to #Auschwitz.pic.twitter.com/Gp9HrnwJvP
